info.title: Address
info.description: Test our API services using API Explorer. Search National Address

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

get.summary: Search for an address by free text.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: It is an optional input. Our API can provide response in Arabic or English with Arabic being the default language.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: It is an optional input. We currently support output for API in two formats Json and XML. You will be required to specify in which format you need response, default is Json.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Its an optional input. By default each request returns a maximum number of 10 results. If there are a large number of results, in such a case, this page number must be passed along to get the next set of results. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: addressstring
parameters.description: Free text details in a string format for a address

parameters.name: encode
parameters.description: Get response in utf-8.Pass input as 'utf8'.

get.summary: Search for an address by fixed parameters.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: It is an optional input. Our API can provide response in Arabic or English with Arabic being the default language.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: It is an optional input. We currently support output for API in two formats Json and XML. You will be required to specify in which format you need response, default is Json.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Its an optional input. By default each request returns a maximum number of 10 results. If there are a large number of results, in such a case, this page number must be passed along to get the next set of results. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: cityid
parameters.description: Id of city for which you want to get an address. You can obtain this id by using KSA Cities Lookup Api

parameters.name: districtid
parameters.description: Id of district for which you want to get an address. You can obtain this id by using KSA Districts Lookup Api

parameters.name: Buildingnumber
parameters.description: Buildingnumber

parameters.name: Additionalnumber
parameters.description: Additionalnumber

parameters.name: Zipcode
parameters.description: Zipcode

parameters.name: cityname
parameters.description: Name of a city

parameters.name: districtname
parameters.description: Name of a district

parameters.name: streetname
parameters.description: Name of a street

parameters.name: encode
parameters.description: Get response in utf-8.Pass input as 'utf8'.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: It is an optional input. Our API can provide response in Arabic or English with Arabic being the default language.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: It is an optional input. We currently support output for API in two formats Json and XML. You will be required to specify in which format you need response, default is Json.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Its an optional input. By default each request returns a maximum number of 10 results. If there are a large number of results, in such a case, this page number must be passed along to get the next set of results. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: addressstring
parameters.description: Address attributes would be separated with a pipe. Whereas, each address would be separated from others with a semicolon. BuildingNumber l ZipCode l AdditionalNumber;

parameters.description: Get response in utf-8.Pass input as 'utf8'.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Its an optional input. By default each request returns a maximum number of 10 results. If there are a large number of results, in such a case, this page number must be passed along to get the next set of results. Default value is 1.

get.summary: Search for points of interest by fixed parameters....
get.description: Search for points of interest by fixed parameters.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: It is an optional input. Our API can provide response in Arabic or English with Arabic being the default language.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: It is an optional input. We currently support output for API in two formats Json and XML. You will be required to specify in which format you need response, default is Json.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Its an optional input. By default each request returns a maximum number of 10 results. If there are a large number of results, in such a case, this page number must be passed along to get the next set of results. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: servicestring
parameters.description: Name of the point of interest for search.

parameters.name: servicecategoryid
parameters.description: ID of service category by which its recognized in system. You can obtain service category id by using Service Category Api

parameters.name: servicesubcategoryid
parameters.description: ID of service Sub category by which its recognized in system. You can obtain service sub category id by using Service Sub Category Api

parameters.name: regionid
parameters.description: Id of region for which you want to get an address. You can obtain this id by using KSA Regions Lookup Api

parameters.name: cityid
parameters.description: Id of city for which you want to get an address. You can obtain this id by using KSA Cities Lookup Api

parameters.name: districtid
parameters.description: Id of district for which you want to get an address. You can obtain this id by using KSA Districts Lookup Api

parameters.description: Buildingnumber

parameters.name: Additionalnumber
parameters.description: Additionalnumber

parameters.name: Zipcode
parameters.description: Zipcode

parameters.name: cityname
parameters.description: Name of a city

parameters.name: districtname
parameters.description: Name of a district

parameters.name: streetname
parameters.description: Name of a street

parameters.name: encode
parameters.description: Get response in utf-8.Pass input as 'utf8'.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: It is an optional input. Our API can provide response in Arabic or English with Arabic being the default language.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: It is an optional input. We currently support output for API in two formats Json and XML. You will be required to specify in which format you need response, default is Json.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Its an optional input. By default each request returns a maximum number of 10 results. If there are a large number of results, in such a case, this page number must be passed along to get the next set of results. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude in decimal units.

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: Longitude in decimal units.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Its an optional input. In Kilometers. Default = 0.5 kms

parameters.name: encode
parameters.description: Get response in utf-8.Pass input as 'utf8'.
